interestingFact: There are 195 countries in the world today. including 193 United Nations member states and 2 observer states.
India is home to the Taj Mahal, and also one of the Seven Wonders of the World.
The United States was the first country to land a man on the moon.
Japan is made up of over 6,800 islands.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest in the world, covering about 60% of the entire country.
Germany is known for its engineering and is the birthplace of the automobile.
Australia is the only continent that is also a country.
Egypt is famous for its ancient pyramids and pharaohs.
